summary: Equip a Skull Head for maximum intimidation factor. Like ghost rider... without the fire.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Skull Head
=================================================================================================================================
DESCRIPTION

Equip a Skull Head for maximum intimidation factor. Like ghost rider... without the fire.

I stumbled across some of my old mods that i thought were long lost.
I tired to replicate it but i just cant do it. T.T
I have no idea how i made this a few years ago.
So, releasing it as is in hopes someone shows interest to colaborate and help me out. Lots of projects, so little knowledge. -.-

Well, so far, only human males that are max weight are supported. Works for me because i alway play a pumped up Nord.
If anyone wants to help me out make some variety with fire, ice smoke effects, Flee enchantment for scary factor or such, please PM me.

Also, if u can replicate this, please PM me to make this for all races with assets from Beast Skeletons Resource mod.

Well, if you happen to have a max weight character atm, give it a try for coolness or at least some cool pix and Enjoy. ;)

HOW TO GET IT
Add item via console
"Skull Head"
=================================================================================================================================
REQUIREMENTS
Skyrim v1.9+ (duh)
=================================================================================================================================
RECOMMENDED INSTALL
Install with Mod Organizer <3

MANUAL INSTALL\UNINSTALL
Extract the content from the .rar archive and place the files in "Skyrim\Data" where the game is installed.
Example of default Skyrim installed location:
Windows x32
(C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data\
Windows x64
(C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data\
=================================================================================================================================
FILES AND FOLDERS

Skull Head v1.0 readme.txt
Skull Head.esp

Meshes\theimmersion\Outfit\Skull Head\Male\
Human_1

Meshes\theimmersion\SHARED\
genericworldmodel
genericworldmodelf
=================================================================================================================================
DISCLAIMER
I am not responsible for any and all damages that arise from use of this mod.
Use at your own risk!

General Permission!
You can do with the mod itself what ever you want (modify, improve or simplify) for personal use only.
However, You cant include or claim as Your own any modified or unmodified files and commertialize or reupload them outside "Special Permisions!".

Special Permissions!
You may modify, include, reupload or otherwise use the following files and folders as You see fit.
(Do remember to rename them for your own mod to avoid conflicts.)
Plugin and Scripts. (Source scripts included for that purpouse.)

Special Permission apllies to the following files:
NONE
=================================================================================================================================
CHANGELOG

1.0
Found this among some old mods.
Checked for errors and functionality for public release.
=================================================================================================================================
CURRENT BUILD NOTES
Very early stage of mod. I lack the knowhow to release it as i really want it so this is as far as it gets for now.

FUTURE PLANS
Hoping to learn or to get help for:
Adding skulls for all playable races. Elfs, Kajiit, Argonians.
Adding enchantments like flee and intimidation to skulls.
Adding various skulls with effects, fire (skull burning), smoke , glowing eyes etc.
Adding Hair Styles from other hair mods if i find appropriate and get permissions.
=================================================================================================================================
MISCELLANEOUS

So i dont exactly know how "not safe for work" and what not is.
Cuz i consider adults only not just b*obs and a*s but gore like open neck with spine and skull comming out if it as well. So.
I will put it as adult only content and not safe for work,
unless someone can confirm to me that this mod does not fall under those categories
so i can remove those limits and the mod gets a bit more exposure.
=================================================================================================================================
CREDITS
Original Author: theimmersion
Other Contributors: Luck for finding this in my HDD lost and found box. xD
=================================================================================================================================
[/center]
author: theimmersion
